text: The year is completed, and ye have brought all the produce into the storehouses; but there shall be the plunder thereof in its house: return now on this behalf, saith the Lord Almighty, see if I will not open to you the 3. 10 Or, windows, see Gen 7. 11, there rendered 'flood-gates.'torrents of heaven, and pour out my blessing upon you, until ye are satisfied.
